H0.text: what time in hilo hawaii. Pacific Standard Time

H1.text: what time in hilo hawaii. Alaska Time

H2.text: what time in hilo hawaii. Mountain Standard Time

H3.text: what time in hilo hawaii. Hawaii–Aleutian Time Zone

A4.text: The Hawaii–Aleutian Time Zone observes Hawaii–Aleutian Standard Time (HST) by subtracting ten hours from Coordinated Universal Time (UTC−10:00).

A5.text: The clock time in this zone is based on the mean solar time of the 150th meridian west of the Greenwich Observatory.
